source.class:
Class PrinterMoreInfo is a printing attribute class, a URI, that is used to obtain more information about this specific printer. For example, this could be an HTTP type URI referencing an HTML page accessible to a web browser. The information obtained from this URI is intended for end user consumption. Features outside the scope of the Print Service API can be accessed from this URI. The information is intended to be specific to this printer instance and site specific services (e.g. job pricing, services offered, end user assistance).

In contrast, the {@link PrinterMoreInfoManufacturerPrinterMoreInfoManufacturer} attribute is used to find out more information about this general kind of printer rather than this specific printer.

IPP Compatibility: The string form returned by toString() gives the IPP uri value. The category name returned by getName() gives the IPP attribute name.

Alan Kaminsky Constructs a new printer more info attribute with the specified URI. uri URI. NullPointerException(unchecked exception) Thrown if uri is null. Returns whether this printer more info attribute is equivalent to the passed in object. To be equivalent, all of the following conditions must be true:

  1. object is not null.
  2. object is an instance of class PrinterMoreInfo.
  3. This printer more info attribute's URI and object's URI are equal.
object Object to compare to. True if object is equivalent to this printer more info attribute, false otherwise. Get the printing attribute class which is to be used as the "category" for this printing attribute value.

For class PrinterMoreInfo, the category is class PrinterMoreInfo itself. Printing attribute class (category), an instance of class{@link java.lang.Class java.lang.Class}.
